name: Red Rocket Co
description:
If you start to experience lag in browser, consider downloading and running the game, as Unity WebGL is notoriously bad for performance.

Program the parts of your ship so that it reaches its goal.

WASD to move the camera around, scroll wheel to zoom in and out.

Use the timeline at the bottom of the screen to program what your ship does and when, and click the play button at the top-right to start it.

Reset your ship to the last checkpoint with the yellow reset button in the top-right, this will keep your timeline.

There is no official end screen, the last checkpoint won't have an arrow.

This was made for a 48 hour game jam.
